name: BioEntity
description:
Entry # 142:
The entity has shown incredible progress these past few weeks. Not only does it respond to various stimuli, it can accelerate rapidly and shows signs of learning from previous trials. It’s a shame that my research must be kept hidden from prying eyes, but I have never been more certain of the importance of my work.
- Dr. Marie Fernandez

BioEntity is the first game from independent studio Sneaky Party LLC!

  • 30+ levels of 2D retro platforming action!
  • Move in any direction and stick to any surface!
  • Defeat enemies and get powerups for new abilities!
  • Boss battles, bonus mini-games and unlockables!
  • Collect energy and race for the fastest level times!

Coming soon for Windows & Mac!
